API Reference¶

Modules¶

cgdat.qt_custom This package contains all the additional classes and functions that are used in the CGDAT data anaylsis tool.
cgdat.qt_ui This package contains all the QT python classes that were autogenearted out of the .ui files by the PyQt5.uic.pyuic module.

Functions¶

cgdat.cgdat This file contains the main GUI class that is used in the Conditional game data analyse tool (CGDAT) was created for a friend of mine to help him with the data analysis he had to do for his graduation project.
cgdat.create_shortcut_cl This function creates a shortcut which can be used to run the CGDAT tool
cgdat.start_cl This script is used to starts the cgdat gui out of the command line

Scripts¶

start_cgdat This script is used to strat the cgdat gui out of the command line
install_cgdat Python function used to install the CGDAT package, its dependencies and create a shortcut.
create_shortcut_cl This function creates a shortcut which can be used to run the CGDAT tool
